column5: Got out for some dusk/night fishing.  We both managed 4 bass each.  The bite was not great but we had fun
Nice, I'm going to be trying that this year a few nights SBK

When I was a young lad (16) I never thought of going surface fishing on the Otonabee River before 09:00 pm...  A Jitterbug or Crazy Crawler was the only lures I used...  At 75 I'm not agile enough to be stumbling around in the dark...not even in the "Tin of Beans"...
i love night fishing.... I use top water lure.... u hear it,... then u feel it.... then u set it.... what a rush
?????? i dont think ive ever caught a bass after 9pm, maybe the occasional rockie. the bite on temagami shuts off at 9pm like someone slammed the door.  sounds like a good time.
cool night i bet you guys had a great time
Give it a try.  Use the right lures and I think you might be surprised
If I had a ringtailed lemur beard I'd fish at night too.   Nice fish.
You might be but the memory remains.
a black Jitterbug and HOLD ON
